english.value: Please place the host or handle on the ground to confirm the current ground height
Please use the handle to point to the ground and hold down the trigger button to delimit the game area.For better experience, it is recommended to delimit a game area of at least 2*2 meters
The play area is too small
The current designated area is less than the minimum game area of 1*1 meter. Please re-deline or switch to the original area.
Please make sure that there are no other objects obstructing the boundary of the original place, and you are injured when placed for an immersive game experience.
You have left the protective boundary, please return or redraw the boundary.
The current area has met the scope requirements of the game area
Please confirm that there are no obstructing objects in the area to prevent injuries during the immersive gaming experience
You have left the protective boundary. Please take off the headset and return, or create a new protective boundary.

chinese.value: 请将主机或手柄放置于地面以确认当前地面高度
请使用手柄指向地面并按住扳机键为游戏区域划定边界。为了更好的体验游戏，建议划定至少2*2米的游戏区域
当前划定区域小于1*1米的最小游戏区域，请重新划定或切换原地区域。
请确认原地边界内没有其他物品遮挡，防止进行沉浸式游戏体验时受伤。
您已离开防护边界，请返回或重新创建边界
当前区域已满足游戏区域的范围要求
请确认区域内无遮挡物品，以防止进行沉浸式游戏体验时受伤
您已离开防护边界，请摘下头显并返回，或创建新的防护边界。
